title: Champ Select Ward Skin Greyed Out
body: I don't know if this is just me but sometimes when I play (happened a lot the past couple days) the entire time in champ select my ward skin select will be greyed out and it will not pop up for me to select skins, it just makes me use the last one I used. Restarting the client seems to fix the issue but after playing a few games it sometimes comes back. Its not a major issue but it is a minor annoyance when it occurs, has anyone else experienced this and is Riot looking into fixes?

replies.body:
Is this happening on the updated client?  If so, what happens if you try on the legacy:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if going on the legacy resolves this!
Sorry for not specifying this, but this is actually happening on the legacy client. I play the beta client hardly at all right now, waiting for more features to be added.
That is strange!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a better look at this individually.  We'll get back to you!

By the way I also have another issue that occurs arbitrarily on the legacy client where some time during champ select the screen will instantly overlap itself and the chat gets blocked, the champions list gets blocked, the runes and masteries get blocked, and the ward skin selection gets blocked. Simply moving the mouse over the affected areas tends to fix it, almost like using an eraser on MS paint to erase useless lines. I will take a screenshot the next time it happens and load it here and submit a ticket for it. Its nothing major and doesn't occur too often, maybe once or twice a week of me playing religiously. Still though it is bad coding.
